name: 2024 The 7th International Conference on Information Science and Systems
content: Conference Proceedings: All papers will be strictly double blind reviewed by the program committee, and accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1756-7), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.
organizers: Cardiff University, UK and University of Derby, UK
